statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Bucknell 62, Navy 43
article.story: LEWISBURG, Pa. (AP) -- Donald Brown scored a 15 points in his return from a hand injury and Bucknell defeated Navy 62-43 in a first-round Patriot League game on Wednesday night. Brown had missed seven games after breaking his right hand on Jan. 30 against Colgate. He returned for the Bison at 16:54 of the first half and received a standing ovation. He added nine rebounds in 27 minutes. The Bison (21-8) will host Army in a semifinal game on Sunday. Army advanced with a 47-46 win over Lehigh. Kaleo Kina scored 12 points to lead Navy (14-16). Both teams struggled with their shooting early, with each going more than five minutes in the first half without a point. Bucknell took control of the game over the final 6:32 of the first half. The Bison went on a 16-0 run and opened up a 31-14 lead after two foul shots by Chris McNaughton with 1:20 left in the period. Navy struggled from long distance in the first half, shooting just 2-for-17 from 3-point range. Bucknell opened the second half with a 17-6 run, taking a 50-23 lead with 12:40 left. Navy closed within 16, but the Bison used a 7-0 run to push the lead back to 22. McNaughton finished with 14 points and eight rebounds, and John Griffin added 10 points. Abe Badmus chipped in with nine points, five assists and four steals.
